StatDef.label: Shield max energy loss
StatDef.description: The maximum amount of energy a shield can lose from a single hit.

StatDef.label: Shield active recharge delay
StatDef.description: The amount of time it takes before the shield starts recharging after it has taken damage, but is still active.

StatDef.label: Shield inactive recharge delay
StatDef.description: The amount of time it takes before the shield starts recharging after breaking. This timer resets if the wearer continues to take damage.
